content: penguin egg cozy pattern by rcl intro your cute little penguin friend helps you to keep your chicken egg warm and cozy for your comfy breakfast for an eu egg size of m 53−63g might also work for size l 63−73g untested note us abbr pattern sizes m gauge 16 4 sts x 15 6 row = 10cm level intermediate measurements i croched with yarn over / yarn over abbreviations blo = back loop only flo = front loop only fo = fasten o� magic_ring = magic_ring chain = chain double_crochet = double_crochet decrease = decrease half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet increase = increase single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch additional abbreviations = into the same stitch from the previous round e g single_crochet single_crochet is identical to an increase = to group di�erent
